headline: What Does Clorox’s 27% Stock Drop in 2024 Mean for Investors?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Clorox stock? You are definitely not alone. It is the kind of name that inspires both comfort and debate, especially when the chart looks like a roller coaster. After a losing streak that has lasted most of the year, with shares down 26.9% year-to-date and off nearly 35% over five years, the big question is whether Clorox is now a value play hiding in plain sight or if yesterday’s dips could become tomorrow’s woes. Investors have certainly been reacting to more...
